encounters.name: siphon lifeforce
encounters.desc: The old tree has lain dormant for centuries. Now it draws life back into its branches.

encounters.name: behind you
encounters.desc: Nothing there.

encounters.name: behind you
encounters.desc: Tangled metal skeletons hover behind you.

encounters.name: false alarm
encounters.desc: A transportation alarm triggers, but it appears whatever it was meant to transport is missing.

encounters.name: transport alarm
encounters.desc: A transportation alarm triggers. You step aside to dodge its cargo.

encounters.name: material transportation
encounters.desc: You quickly take off a cold one from the automated transportation system. A slight adjustment to valid transportation targets is needed.

encounters.name: material transportation
encounters.desc: A quick infusion of energy to refresh a weakening sigil.

encounters.name: tiny skeletons
encounters.desc: Tiny, malformed metal skeletons litter the floor.

encounters.name: doll's endoskeletons
encounters.desc: Brass contraptions sit still, inanimate and imperfect.

encounters.name: prepared endoskeletons
encounters.desc: Molded out of brass, they will serve as a fine conduit for animation charms.

encounters.name: blob maker
encounters.desc: The machine throws chunks of metal into a cauldron. Round, bouncy balls emerge.

encounters.name: automatic coater
encounters.desc: A malfunctioning machine attempts to coat the malformed skeletons to no avail.

encounters.name: endo coating station
encounters.desc: You adjust the coating thickness a little, to ensure better adhesion to the base endo.

encounters.name: sudden blindness
encounters.desc: As you clear your eyes, you realize you've been meticulously covered in magical paint.

encounters.name: festive splashing
encounters.desc: A magical painter splashes paint all over, creating unquestionably festive patterns.

encounters.name: painting station
encounters.desc: The automated painter cheerily paints on yet another cute face. No issues here.

encounters.name: booming laugh
encounters.desc: Deep, metallic laugh echoes through the facility.

encounters.name: creepy laugh
encounters.desc: A hysterical, repeating laugh fills the halls.

encounters.name: cheerful laugh
encounters.desc: Cheerful laughter reverberates in the empty halls.

encounters.name: children's laugh
encounters.desc: Sounds of happy children echo in the desolate halls.

encounters.name: cheerful laugh
encounters.desc: Cheerful laughter fills the halls.

encounters.name: children's laugh
encounters.desc: Sounds of happy children echo in the halls. The cold ones seem a little warmer at that.

encounters.name: audit log
encounters.desc: The crumbling pages reveal little.

encounters.name: audit log
encounters.desc: A meticulously organized log of material deliveries. Alchemical reagents and certain metals feature prominently.

encounters.name: audit log
encounters.desc: You review the shipment plans, just in case. No logistical issues seem apparent.

encounters.name: screeching skeleton
encounters.desc: A calmly sitting skeleton suddenly reaches for you, screeching.

encounters.name: animated doll
encounters.desc: It's clear that the enchantments applied to this were meant to follow the animation spellchart, but age has taken its toll.

encounters.name: prototype unit
encounters.desc: The first doll made after the repairs, it now sits as a standard for all future production.

encounters.name: materials stockpile
encounters.desc: You happen upon a store of valuable materials.

encounters.name: materials stockpile
encounters.desc: With the ledger and logs in hand, finding the most valuable of materials proves trivial.

encounters.name: materials stockpile
encounters.desc: Review the material stockpiles for any excesses to apropriate.

encounters.name: metal twister
encounters.desc: A machine repeatedly tears apart then welds together what appears to be unrecognizable lumps of metal.

encounters.name: adjuster
encounters.desc: Once meant to make minute adjustments to better suit individual recipients, it has been reduced to an eternity of useless work.

encounters.name: customization station
encounters.desc: While there are no missives for it to process, it is still used to put a unique touch on every doll you produce.

encounters.name: ebin's notes
encounters.desc: A detailed study of the properties of ice.

encounters.name: tome of winters past
encounters.desc: The year's coldest season is also known for its dark legends.

encounters.name: frozen bookcase
encounters.desc: The cracked pages of the books are fused with ice

encounters.name: drawing mystic schemes
encounters.desc: the patterns must be laid precisely to direct the magic weaves.

encounters.name: placing gems
encounters.desc: Magical gems will focus the power of the tree of rites.

encounters.name: connecting focal points
encounters.desc: Snow golems will serve well for this purpose.

encounters.name: attuning to local magic
encounters.desc: Attuning to magic of the tree, before the rite proceeds.

encounters.name: playing in the snow
encounters.desc: The children seem to enjoy the snowballs you conjure from the air.

encounters.name: windbarrier
encounters.desc: Building a barrier against the harsh winds

encounters.name: conjuring
encounters.desc: Conjuring a fire elemental at the magic circle. That should stave away the cold!

encounters.name: crafting candles
encounters.desc: Crafting everburning candles

encounters.name: stories
encounters.desc: Listening to elders recite their winter legends.

encounters.name: old decorations
encounters.desc: Brass trinkets and baubles adorn the village.

encounters.name: cold snap
encounters.desc: A sudden burst of icy winds chills you to the bone.

encounters.name: emberstone
encounters.desc: Some latent heat springs here from the ground.

encounters.name: water source
encounters.desc: Some of the ice here is melting. How it fights the cold is a mystery.

encounters.name: frozen herbs
encounters.desc: A few herbs still survive in the frozen loam.

encounters.name: sparkling crystals
encounters.desc: A vein of crystals embedded in the cave wall, sparkling in the dark.

encounters.name: ice grave
encounters.desc: A traveller here was frozen alive. The body may still be of use.

encounters.name: ice sculpture
encounters.desc: Humanoid figure formed from ice and snow. The right enchantment will give it life.

encounters.name: ice fairy
encounters.desc: A flickering of crystalline wings can be seen in the distance. Approaching it would be unwise.

rares.name: orb of winters
rares.desc: A snowglobe with magical powers. It reminds you of colder days.

rares.name: coldsteel necklace
rares.desc: Wearing it makes your thoughts cold and your focus sharp.

upgrades_unused.name: fazbit's workshop restoration project
upgrades_unused.desc: This place must have once been a source of great joy to people all over the realm. It would be a tremendous accomplishment to repair it... when the season permits, that is.
upgrades_unused.needtext: Can only be done in winter

upgrades_unused.name: fazbit's sealed winter workshop
upgrades_unused.desc: It slumbers, waiting for the next time it's needed.
upgrades_unused.needtext: Can only be done in winter

upgrades.name: fazbit's jolliness
upgrades.desc: Even in the depths of frost and cold, warmth endures.
